go_data.justification: NCBP2-AS2 is found in the MitoCoP fraction and interacts with inner membrane scaffold proteins and TIM23, indicating its localization to the mitochondrion.
NCBP2-AS2 interacts with the TIM23-PAM machinery, suggesting its involvement in protein import into the mitochondrial matrix.
NCBP2-AS2 associates with different forms of the mitochondrial presequence translocase, indicating its role in mitochondrial protein complex assembly.
